name: Brock The Breaker
description:
Another Breakout clone added to the millions that already exist out there.

There is nothing special about this one. It is just made for me to learn programming, game development, and the SFML library. It would be helpful if you could look at the GitHub repo, take a look at the code, and tell me what you think of my codebase's jumbled mess. Any and all criticism is welcome, truly.

All the assets(sprites and audio) I made myself. The sprite was drawn on Pixelart.com, and the audio was made using BFXR.

Please do not donate to this game. I know you were not going to, but just in case. And if there are any donations I will refund them.

Thank you and enjoy.
